flawed_nl_solution:
Pulling a loaded sled at 10 mph for 180 miles takes 180/10=<<180/10=81>>81 hours
Pulling an unloaded sled at 20 mph for 120 miles takes 120/20=<<120/20=6>>6 hours
Pulling a loaded sled at 10 mph for 80 miles takes 80/10=<<80/10=8>>8 hours
Pulling an unloaded sled at 20 mph for 140 miles takes 140/20=<<140/20=7>>7 hours
In total, Toby will have pulled the sled for 81+6+8+7=<<81+6+8+7=102>>102 hours
#### 102

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
